actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on March 29, 2024.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of Rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the resignation of the gentleman from Colorado, Mr. Buck, the whole number of the House is 431.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on March 25, 2024, at 1:30 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 1258 and S. 3613. Appointments: United States Semiquincentennial Commission and Afghanistan War Commission.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on March 23, 2024, at 2:20 a.m.: That the Senate passed S.J. Res. 62 and S. 4050, the Senate agreed to the House amendment to Senate amendment to H.R. 2882 and the Senate agreed to H. Con. Res. 100.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Monsignor Stephen J. Rossetti, Catholic University of America, Washington, DC
The Speaker designated the Honorable Carol D. Miller to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
